channel.title: Need help with a cut paste command in cache
channel.description:
i need to a line of command that will make it so that when the folder i have for my cache extracts, that it cut's and pastes it into the folder above it...like this is what it looks like
PrimePK Cache--->PrimePk Cache--->contents
i need to make something that will automatically take the contents and past them into the first primepk cache that way when ppl download and run it they dont have to do it manually. and this way i can start to work on a webclient..
